reviews.review:
Got this one on sale for $1, and it was worth both my time and that dollar.
Its a quiz game, and it is very well made. Enjoyed playing it a lot, and works flawlessly on Ubuntu 18.04.
One of the best games I have ever played. Good story and innovative game play. I highly recommend it.
очень харошо но 1 надо зделать так чтоб 2 игрока прошли все и потом 5 глава
It's just good fooking buy it
классная игра я играл и мне понравилось правда пися в попе почимута поэтому 10 из 10
传送门就和我以前对JOJO的态度一样，但是一旦进入其中就让人无法自拔
可玩性很高啊，创意工坊的内容都很好
game very good uuu yes very good for $0.99
This is personally my favorite game of all time.
This game is a very fun and challenging puzzle game that I highly recommend
Офигенная игра позалипать и порешать головоломки, расслабится.
Não estava preparada para ficar tão enjoada

One of the best Games out there, truly great. Played it on console first, then on PC after i received GMOD. This game started my mapping carrier that lasted almost 6 years. Must have for brain teasing enjoyment :>
really cool and fun to play with a friend
极佳的解密游戏，利用手上的portal gun创建传送门解谜的方式十分新奇，甚至说在我第一次在传送门后见到自己实时的身影时震撼到了我。游戏前期营造的恐怖氛围十分到位，令我沉浸其中。游戏构造的空间及背景很广阔，美中不足的是玩久了有种眩晕感和反胃感，这可能因人而异吧。总言之游戏绝赞，非常推荐。
Jogo bom de mais, modo Co-op muito legal, testes bem feitos, jogo com uma qualidade muito boa para a época podendo ser rodado em praticamente qualquer computador
Я покупал по скидке и всю ее прошел, советую купить
Meu Cerebro bugou todo, e fiquei com raiva e sem querer matei minha calposita
What an AMAZING game! There's definitely something in this one for everyone. From the crude humor to the brain bending puzzles this one will really tickle your fancy! :)

I have been playing this game for nearly 220 hours so far, and all I can say is that it is one of my favorite games of all time! The clever puzzles, combined with the ability to connect remote places together in an instant makes the game all the more fun and challenging. The ability to play coop, combined with the ability to view and publish custom community-made maps gives the game a ton of replay-ability. I heavily recommend this game for people wanting to solve well-put-together puzzles logically.
I highly recommend this game, along with the constant use after completion
took me 5 years to beat the campaign, 10/10 would play again
这游戏没个沙雕一起联机就失去了灵魂（x
Mano todo mundo ja sabe mas portal 2 é incrivel e muito divertido principamente o co-op, praticamente todo o me tempo de jogo foi no co-op e acho q nunca me diverti tanto em um jogo de puzzle
Советую поиграть если любите Порталы, Турели, Кооп, Мешать другу в Кооп и Ломать голову))))
Increible juego, puzzles entretenidos, atmosfera de misterio, sarcasmo, y si encuentras abitaciones secretas uff, que tención, 10/10
this is a fun game and i still play it. i even still have it for my old xbox 360
this is the most original game since hopscotch.
great game. the puzzles are some what challanging. hopefully they will make a portal 3.
Love this game. It's one of my all time favorites.
un gran juego, no me canso de jugarlo, y sobre todo la historia, esperemos portal 3 apra el 2030, seguira funcionando ese chiste hasta ese año , aun asi el jeugo es increible

C'mon this is a must have! One of my favorite games of all time. The story and co op modes are already amazing, but the workshop mode makes this an even better investment... you won't run out of content to choose from.
Good game, a little short; not better than the first one.
A much longer version of Portal, very challenging!
I definitely recommend this game to anyone who wishes to have a fun puzzle game with or without friends.
Amazing game 10/10 would recommend to play, a must play a classic of Valve and can still compete with new games even 10 years after its release
mt bom os robozinhos querendo me matar
Seria legal se o meu parceiro n fosse uma anta

Great game
I recommend playing with a friend 
10/10 game
very great game. the workshop is the best place to go to find great maps.

I'd buy that for a dollar!

Seriously, if you don't have Portal 2, buy it!  It's only a dollar.  The humor alone is worth that.
One of the best coop games EVER. Good casting on the story.
停停停！别转了，我脑子有点晕！
